item.title: 美国 20 年期债券收益率创 2021 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 周一上午，20 年期债券不再是美国国债曲线上收益率最高的债券，这只是一瞬间的事。【原文：For a fleeting moment Monday morning, 20-year bonds were no longer offering the highest yields on the US Treasuries curve.】

item.title: 特朗普计划利用拜登的绿色银行提供数十亿美元贷款
item.description: 根据政府 2026 财年预算申请的详细内容，特朗普政府计划利用总统曾试图扼杀的 4000 亿美元绿色银行，为核反应堆、地热发电和关键矿产提供数十亿美元的贷款。【原文：The Trump administration plans to use a $400 billion green bank the president once sought to kill to finance billions of dollars in loans for nuclear reactors, geothermal power and critical minerals, according to details of the administration’s fiscal year 2026 budget request.】

item.title: 特朗普在贸易谈判中青睐飞机制造商，美国银行上调波音公司评级至买入
item.description: 特朗普政府已将波音公司的飞机订单纳入贸易谈判，这有助于恢复美国银行（Bank of America Corp.【原文：The Trump administration has been including orders for Boeing Co. planes in trade discussions, and that’s helping to restore Bank of America Corp.’s confidence in the stock.】

item.title: 美国经济出现漏洞
item.description: 大家好，欢迎收看《奇货可居》时事通讯，这里每天都有来自《奇货可居》的精彩内容。有时是我们乔-韦森塔尔（Joe Weisenthal）和特蕾西-阿洛维（Tracy Alloway）为您带来我们对市场、金融和经济最新发展的看法。有时是我们的专家嘉宾和消息来源网络提供的内容。不管是什么，我们保证永远有趣。【原文：Hello and welcome to the newsletter, a grab bag of daily content from the Odd Lots universe. Sometimes it's us, Joe Weisenthal and Tracy Alloway, bringing you our thoughts on the most recent developments in markets, finance and the economy. And sometimes it's contributions from our network of expert guests and sources. Whatever it is, we promise it will always be interesting.】

item.title: 阿尔伯塔省野火导致加拿大约 7% 的石油生产停产
item.description: 加拿大能源中心地带阿尔伯塔省的野火导致该省近 35 万桶重质原油日产量停产，约占全国产量的 7%。【原文：Wildfires in Canada’s energy heartland of Alberta have shut down almost 350,000 barrels of daily heavy crude production — about 7% of the country’s output — as a major blaze near the province’s eastern border menaces oil sands operations.】

item.title: 贸易紧张局势加剧，特朗普团队推动与习近平通话
item.description: 据特朗普政府的一位官员称，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普和中国国家主席习近平很可能在本周举行会谈，因为世界上最大的两个经济体仍处于贸易动荡之中。【原文：US President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping are likely to speak this week, according to a Trump administration official, as the world’s two largest economies remain locked in trade turmoil.】

item.title: 德国银行支付数百万美元解决破产的 Signa 公司的索赔问题
item.description: 最近几周，Helaba 和其他德国贷款机构支付了数百万欧元，以解决前房地产大亨 Rene Benko 的 Signa Prime Selection AG 管理人提出的索赔。【原文：Helaba and other German lenders have paid millions of euros in recent weeks to settle claims by the administrator of former real estate tycoon Rene Benko’s Signa Prime Selection AG.】

item.title: 马里法院将对巴里克金矿的裁决推迟至 6 月 5 日
item.description: 马里法院第三次推迟了对巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：A Malian court has for the third time postponed a ruling on whether Barrick Gold Corp.’s Loulo-Gounkoto mine should be placed under state administration.】

item.title: 比特币投机热潮消退，赛勒的比特币 "山寨版 "落伍了
item.description: 事实证明，购买比特币来提高股价可能并不像以前看起来那样是企业的灵丹妙药。【原文：Turns out, buying Bitcoin to boost your share price might not be the corporate panacea that it once seemed.】

item.title: 量化对冲基金 CFM 在多伦多设立办事处，进军加拿大市场
item.description: 法国量化对冲基金 Capital Fund Management SA 在多伦多开设了办事处，以吸引加拿大的富裕投资者。【原文：French quantitative hedge fund Capital Fund Management SA opened an office in Toronto to attract wealthy investors in Canada.】

item.title: 中国对稀土的掌控为习近平在美国贸易对决中提供了筹码
item.description: 中美两国在日内瓦就降低天价关税达成一致后，目前在芯片和稀土的使用权问题上的紧张局势急剧升温。北京似乎越来越有优势。【原文：After the US and China agreed in Geneva to lower tariffs from astronomical heights, tensions are now surging over access to chips and rare earths. And Beijing increasingly appears to have an edge.】

item.title: 马特黑向智利投票承诺人提出财政困境的现实问题
item.description: 面对左翼和右翼两条战线上的竞选活动，智利总统候选人伊夫林-马特希（Evelyn Matthei）试图通过承认经济疲软这一冷酷无情的事实，而不是通过全面的承诺来标新立异。【原文：Faced with an electoral campaign fought on two fronts — against the left and the hard right — Chile’s presidential front-runner Evelyn Matthei is trying to mark a difference not through sweeping promises, but by recognizing the cold, hard facts of a weak economy.】

item.title: 美国 5 月制造业活动连续第三个月萎缩
item.description: 美国 5 月份的工厂活动连续第三个月萎缩，一项进口指标跌至 16 年来的最低点，原因是面对更高的关税，企业采取了缩减措施。【原文：US factory activity contracted in May for a third consecutive month and a gauge of imports fell to a 16-year low as firms pulled back in the face of higher tariffs.】

item.title: 特朗普希望出售美国 100 万桶柴油储备
item.description: 特朗普政府希望将 100 万桶柴油储备投放市场，并称旨在为东北部地区提供紧急家庭取暖油供应的储备从未用于预期目的。【原文：The Trump administration wants to put a 1 million barrel cache of diesel fuel on the market, saying the reserve meant to provide an emergency supply of home heating oil for the Northeast has never been used for its intended purpose.】

item.title: 贸易摩擦和地缘政治影响市场情绪，美国股市下滑
item.description: 周一开盘，美国股市走低，原因是围绕全球贸易再度出现的紧张局势削弱了投资者的信心。【原文：US equities edged lower at the open Monday as reemerging tensions around global trade sapped investor confidence.】

item.title: 最高法院让 Finra 案继续审理，考验华尔街的自我监管能力
item.description: 美国最高法院允许金融业监管局继续对一家被控偷窃客户的经纪公司进行纪律处分，此案考验了华尔街长期以来对自律组织的依赖。【原文：The US Supreme Court let the Financial Industry Regulatory Authority proceed with disciplinary proceedings against a brokerage accused of stealing from customers in a case testing Wall Street’s longstanding reliance on self-regulatory organizations.】

item.title: 风险缓解，法国取消负债企业银行资本规定
item.description: 在监管机构表示贷款人面临的风险低于两年前之后，法国将放宽对其最大银行在高负债公司风险敞口方面的一些资本要求。【原文：France will ease some capital requirements for its largest banks on exposure to highly-indebted companies, after regulators said lenders face lower risk than they did two years ago.】

item.title: 航天防务公司 Voyager 寻求 IPO 筹资 3.19 亿美元
item.description: 旅行者科技公司（Voyager Technologies Inc.【原文：Voyager Technologies Inc. is seeking to raise as much as $319 million in an initial public offering, as it looks to capitalize on rising government spending on advanced defense technologies and space exploration.】

item.title: 矿业激增，智利经济预计增长三倍
item.description: 智利中央银行的月度经济活动主要指标显示，智利 4 月份的经济增长超过预期，原因是采矿业产值跃升，抵消了制造业和零售业的下降。【原文：Chile’s economy grew more than expected in April as mining output jumped, offsetting a drop in manufacturing and retail, according to the central bank’s main gauge of monthly activity.】

item.title: 法国修订海上风电场合同以缓解电力过剩问题
item.description: 法国政府与三家海上风力发电场签署了购电协议修正案，允许它们在负价格期间削减部分或全部产量。【原文：The French government and three offshore wind power farms signed amendments to power-purchase agreements, allowing them to curtail part or all of their production during periods of negative prices.】

item.title: 乌克兰正在建造无人机猎手，战斗已远远超越前线
item.description: 随着双方无人机工程师的聪明才智为前线后方带来新的机遇和威胁，一场战斗正在乌克兰和俄罗斯的上空形成。【原文：A battle is shaping up in the skies over Ukraine and Russia, as the ingenuity of drone engineers on both sides opens up new opportunities and threats far behind the front lines.】

item.title: 麦肯锡借助人工智能更快制作 PowerPoint 和起草提案
item.description: 麦肯锡公司的顾问们越来越多地使用该公司的人工智能生成平台来起草提案和制作 PowerPoint 幻灯片，该平台已经发展到足以接管至少部分通常由初级员工完成的任务。【原文：McKinsey & Co.’s consultants are increasingly drafting proposals and making PowerPoint slides using the firm’s generative artificial intelligence platform, which has developed enough to take over at least some of the tasks typically performed by junior employees.】

item.title: 特朗普加倍征收关税，美国铝和钢铁价格飙升
item.description: 在唐纳德-特朗普总统表示本周将对铝和钢加征双倍关税后，追踪美国制造商支付的铝和钢价格的期货价格飙升。【原文：Futures tracking the prices US manufacturers pay for aluminum and steel surged after President Donald Trump said he will double tariffs on the metals this week.】

item.title: 加蓬旨在终止锰矿出口，Eramet 股票下跌
item.description: 加蓬决定从 2029 年起禁止出口锰矿石，这危及到这家法国矿商最大的利润来源，随后 Eramet SA 股价下跌达 5.7%。【原文：Eramet SA shares fell as much as 5.7% after Gabon decided to ban the export of manganese ore from 2029, jeopardizing the French miner’s biggest source of profit.】

item.title: 扩大 IPO 规模后，Circle 和支持者寻求获得 8.96 亿美元资金
item.description: Circle Internet Group Inc. 及其股东增加了该公司首次公开募股的规模和价格，表明投资者对该公司股票的需求强劲。【原文：Circle Internet Group Inc. and its shareholders have increased the size and price of the company’s initial public offering, suggesting strong investor demand for the stock.】

item.title: 以太坊联合创始人称赞迈克尔-赛勒创办加密货币财政公司 Nudge
item.description: 加密货币的长期倡导者、以太坊联合创始人乔-卢宾（Joe Lubin）说，大约六个月前，他被一位最著名的数字代币囤积倡导者说服，成立了一家公司来投资以太坊网络的原生货币。【原文：Long-time crypto advocate and Ethereum co-founder Joe Lubin says he was swayed into launching a firm to invest in the network’s native currency about six-months ago by the best-known advocate of stockpiling digital tokens.】

item.title: 北欧资本将诺巴银行的首次公开募股推迟到下半年进行
item.description: 北欧资本公司（Nordic Capital）以市场波动为由，推迟了其对消费金融提供商诺巴银行集团（Noba Bank Group AB）的首次公开募股。【原文：Nordic Capital is pushing back the launch of its initial public offering of consumer finance provider Noba Bank Group AB citing market volatility.】

item.title: 加密货币主经纪商 FalconX 收购对冲基金 Monarq 大部分股份
item.description: 数字资产主经纪商 FalconX 已获得多行政加密货币对冲基金 Monarq Asset Management 母公司的多数股权，该公司正寻求扩大资产管理服务。【原文：Digital asset prime broker FalconX has taken a majority stake in the parent company of multistrategy crypto hedge fund Monarq Asset Management, as the firm seeks to expand asset management services.】

item.title: 波兰拳击手转任总统将与政府摊牌
item.description: Karol Nawrocki 以格斗为职业。这位历史学家出身的政治家曾是业余拳击冠军，自认是足球流氓，还写过关于反共组织和有组织犯罪的书。【原文：Karol Nawrocki has made a career out of fighting. An amateur boxing champion and self-confessed football hooligan, the historian-turned-politician has written books on anti-communist groups and organized crime.】

item.title: 欧佩克+"增产可能 "欲盖弥彰
item.description:
产出的实际增长可能小于标题数字，也许只有一半进入市场。【原文：

The real increase in output will likely be smaller than the headline figure, with perhaps only half reaching the market.

】
